app.title: EPCalculator v2 - Error Probability Calculator
app.tagline: A treasure map fer calculatin' signal errors, arr!

params.title: Simulation Plunder
params.customConstellationHelp: Enter yer own star coordinates here, matey
params.quadraturePointsHelp: Number o' quadrature points fer integration
params.fixErrors: Fix th' errors before ye sail, scallywag!

results.title: Treasure Found
results.computingHint: This be takin' a few ticks o' the clock
results.errorProbabilityDesc: Chance o' a message goin' overboard
results.errorExponentDesc: How fast errors walk th' plank
results.optimalRhoDesc: Best course found by th' navigator
results.noResultsHint: Set yer parameters an' press "Calculate th' Plunder!" ye landlubber.

simulation.title: Error Probability Voyage
simulation.description: Set yer modulation parameters an' calculate error probability, arr!

plottingPanel.title: Chart Plottin'
plottingPanel.description: Draw charts showin' error probability across th' seven seas.
plottingPanel.generatingHint: Calculatin' points an' renderin' th' map
plottingPanel.noPlotsHint: Configure yer voyage an' press "Draw th' Chart" t' create one.

plotting.title: Chart Controls
plotting.mbNotAvailable: MB not available wit' β as X-axis
plotting.mbDescription: Maxwell-Boltzmann distribution: Q(x) ∝ exp(-β|x|²). Shapes th' constellation power.
plotting.fixErrors: Fix th' errors before chartin', ye scurvy dog!
plotting.importHelp: Import data from other ships: Python, MATLAB, Excel, etc.
plotting.mergeOrNewDescription: A chart with th' same axes already be existin'. Would ye like t' merge th' new data or create a separate figure?

constellation.title: Custom Star Map
constellation.description: Chart yer own star map wit' precise point coordinates an' chances, arrr!
constellation.textFormatHint: Format: x,y per line or x,y,p fer weighted
constellation.parseError: Failed t' parse text. Use format: x,y or x,y,p per line

dataImport.title: Import Treasure Data
dataImport.dragDrop: Drop yer scroll here or click t' upload

validation.modulationPowerOf2: Modulation must be a power o' 2, between 2 an' 512
validation.qamPerfectSquare: QAM modulation must be a perfect square (4, 16, 64, 256)
validation.customConstellationInvalid: Custom star map be invalid (check probabilities)
validation.codeLengthRange: Code length must be between 1 an' 1000000
validation.quadratureRange: Quadrature points must be between 2 an' 40
validation.xRangeInvalid: X range: min must be less than max
validation.x2RangeInvalid: X2 range: min must be less than max
validation.x2PointsRange: X2 points must be between 1 an' 101

footer.title: EPCalculator v2
footer.description: A modern treasure calculator fer error probability in digital waters.
footer.copyright: EPCalculator. Built wit' modern web tech.

tutorial.welcomeSubtitle: Error Probability Calculator for Digital Communications
tutorial.singlePointDesc: Compute error probability for specific parameter values. Set modulation, SNR, and code rate to get instant results.
tutorial.plottingDesc: Generate interactive plots to explore how error probability changes across parameter ranges. Compare different configurations visually.
tutorial.pressEscHint: Press Enter or Esc to continue
tutorial.stepAxisScalesDesc: Each axis can be Linear or Logarithmic. For SNR axes, toggle between dB and linear units. The button shows the state it will switch to when clicked.
tutorial.stepTransposeDesc: Swap the X and Y axes to view the data from a different perspective.
tutorial.stepExportDesc: Export your plot as PNG, SVG for images, or CSV for raw data analysis.
tutorial.stepRemoveDesc: Remove this plot from your workspace. You can always generate it again.
tutorial.stepContourComparisonDesc: Select multiple contour plots using the checkboxes to compare them. Use Comparison to show differences between two plots, or Benchmark to overlay multiple 3D surfaces.
tutorial.stepConstellationDesc: Drag points to move them. Hover to see coordinates.
tutorial.stepConstellationTableDesc: Edit point coordinates and probabilities precisely.
tutorial.stepConstellationLuckyDesc: Generate a random constellation with 2-16 points. The constellation is automatically normalized to have unit energy and probabilities summing to 1.
tutorial.stepConstellationHideTableDesc: Show or hide the points table to focus on the visual editor or get more precise control over point values.
